content: using black yarn magic_ring ch1 8 single_crochet in the ring invisible join fo weave in ends nose using black yarn ch4 2sc in the second chain from the hook single_crochet 3sc in last chain on backside of chain single_crochet 2 join fo weave in ends hot glue or sew the eyes and nose as shown in the picture using black yarn and tapestry needle sew on mouth make large white pompom and attach on pointed end enjoy and merry christmas
